level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:
"DCPS" means the District of Columbia Public Schools established by ยง 38-171. The term "DCPS" does not include public charter schools.
Been in operation for no fewer than 5 years;
Forty percent or fewer of its students meeting proficiency on the District of Columbia Comprehensive Assessment System examination in both reading and math; and
Seventy-five percent or more of its students qualify for free or reduced-price lunch; or
Is a tier one or tier 2 school;
Has been in operation for no fewer than 5 years; and
A DCPS teacher who receives a rating of "highly effective" under the DCPS IMPACT evaluation system; or
A public charter school teacher who receives a rating that meets the highly effective standard agreed upon by the Mayor and that public charter school.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-142
level.text: For history of Law 19-142, see notes under ยง 38-751.01.
